The most common misconception among self-identifying #bitcoin maximalists is that sidechains are a scaling solution. Peter Wuille is correct here. There are non-trivial security implications to sidechains.
Pieter Wuille
@pwuille
 · Aug 27, 2018
Replying to @AndyCoins @nilspn and 2 others
Sidechains are not scalability solution. They're a way to experiment with new blockchain technology without needing to introduce a new currency first - but the security model is very different than Bitcoins (with merged mined sidechains, miners can steal funds e.g.).
